title: Bee Avenger HD v2.2.3
description:
The Bad Bear stole the hive where our superhero Bee Avenger lived with his friends. Flying will not be fast enough to recover his house, he'll need to face various adventures, overcoming many obstacles and chasing the bear for several worlds.

This fun game has very addictive gameplay that uses the accelerometer control, you'll be challenged to ride the Bee Avenger dodging obstacles and picking up items to complete each level.

The game animations follows a fun theme like Angry Birds and an addictive gameplay based on Motion Control(Accelerometer) like Trial Xtreme.

Features:

Addictive gameplay 
Motion control (Accelerometer)
Very challenging (can you get 3 stars?)
Cool graphics
Forest world with 23 levels
Next worlds: Desert, Cavern and Snowfall
Best game credits ever

What's new:

Accelerometer calibration
Minor bug fixes
